definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious

sentences.english: You can draw them on paper or on white boards.
sentences.chinese: 可以將其畫在紙上或白板上。

sentences.english: The characteristics of shareable electronic white-board are described.
sentences.chinese: 描述了共享電子白板的應用特徵。

sentences.english: Stem cells, on the other hand, are blank slates with the potential to develop in many different ways.
sentences.chinese: 幹細胞卻像一張白板，有着向各個方向發展的潛能。

sentences.english: Write the key discussion questions on a whiteboard or flipchart.
sentences.chinese: 把關鍵性的討論問題寫在白板上或者活頁白掛紙上。

sentences.english: Magnetic whiteboards are expensive, but quite key.
sentences.chinese: 有磁力的白板雖然價格昂貴，卻是很關鍵的設備。

sentences.english: Hume thought the mind a blank slate (tabula rasa) on which experience could be written.
sentences.chinese: 休姆說思想就是白板，經驗是可以寫上去的。

sentences.english: Mount a dry-erase board and a plastic bin on the inside of a cabinet door with double-sided foam mounting tape.
sentences.chinese: 用雙面膠在櫥門裏面安裝一塊白板和一個塑料收納箱。

sentences.english: Each classroom is air-conditioned and equipped with a visualizer, whiteboard, video projector and classroom-based computers.
sentences.chinese: 每間教室都配有空調，觀測儀，白板，投影儀和電腦。

sentences.english: Obviously whiteboards require markers and erasers.
sentences.chinese: 當然，白板需要有配套的馬克筆和板擦。

sentences.english: Coated White boards are of great prospect in its extensive application as quality packaging material.
sentences.chinese: 塗布白板紙作爲精美包裝材料具有廣泛的應用前景。

sentences.english: This paper analysis the interrelationship in the three consistency circuits inthe Xin layer pulp.
sentences.chinese: 本論文結合白板紙製漿線，詳細分析了濃度調節工藝。

sentences.english: Wang shows her students a white board with a poem written in Chinese characters.
sentences.chinese: 王老師展示一塊白板，上面用漢字寫了一首詩歌。

sentences.english: And then you write down 3 choices on the flipchart against which people will raise hand to indicate their choices.
sentences.chinese: 然後你在白板上寫上3個選擇，讓大家舉手選擇。

sentences.english: Please wipe out the triangle in the bottom left-hand corner of the whiteboard.
sentences.chinese: 請把白板上左下角的三角形擦去。

sentences.english: I like it when Professor Tang provided us with whiteboard so that we can practice writing sentences in class.
sentences.chinese: 我對老師讓我們在白板上當堂寫句子感到很喜歡。

sentences.english: Every classroom is air-conditioned and equipped with a visualizer, whiteboard, video projector and classroom-based computers.
sentences.chinese: 每間教室都配有空調，觀測儀，白板，投影儀和電腦。

definition: book/notebook/Japanese-style self-published comic (esp. an erotic one), aka "dōjinshi"/CL:本[ben3]/edition
